name: ID
definition: the ID allocated to the specific SAA allocation

name: SAA_ID
definition: the ID allocated to the specific SAA associated with this allocation

name: ASSET_TYPE
definition: the asset type for this allocation

name: DESCRIPTION
definition: the description for this allocation, usually just the asset type

name: TAG_LEVEL_1
definition: the sub asset type for the allocation, for reference only and applies to Japan only
